name: Axis12
tagline: Enterprise Drupal and Solr development and support
description:
Axis12 specialise in designing and building high traffic, enterprise websites and applications using Open Source technologies.
We were the first ISO27001 accredited Drupal hosting company in the UK.
We are experts in Drupal and Solr, and pride ourselves on having solved some of the biggest content challenges in Europe for major newspapers, health services and cultural institutions.
We provide a full website delivery life cycle from consulting, specification, design, development, through to launch & release, hosting, training and support.
We also have a number of products such as our hosted Solr as a Service product, which provide powerful "plug and play" functionality for our clients.
